title: Lavaproof Bug Net
summaries: The Lavaproof Bug Net is an upgraded version of the Bug Net. It allows the player to successfully catch the Lavafly, Magma Snail, and Hell Butterfly. It swings faster than the Bug Net and can destroy tall grass and vines.
Its upgraded version is the Golden Bug Net which is faster and bigger.

statistics.Tooltip: 'For when things get too hot to handle'
statistics.Sell: 5
